projects.name: pb-ai
projects.description: Machine learning pipeline to predict League of Legends pick/ban outcomes using Oracle's Elixir data, with ingestion and training scripts.
projects.future: Implement inference CLI, automate data ingestion, add model serving/storage/versioning, and build a UI for draft visualization.

projects.name: cpm-detail
projects.description: Flask web app that pulls League of Legends match data from the Riot API to show CS-per-minute details and comparisons.
projects.future: Add caching/rate-limit handling, improve visualizations, centralize API key/config, and add deployment documentation.

projects.name: example-projects
projects.description: Archived set of Discord4J example bots demonstrating simple slash commands, with Maven/Gradle and Spring Boot variants.

projects.name: project-index
projects.description: Static portfolio site that renders a personal project index from projects.json for easy updates and GitHub Pages hosting.
projects.future: Replace placeholder data with real entries, add tag/status filters, and refine layout polish.

projects.name: java-collection-archive
projects.description: Archived collection repo for prior Java projects.

projects.name: ScanReconciliationTool
projects.description: Archived portfolio demo of a Spring Boot web app for reconciling scan metadata across systems like SonarQube, Bitbucket, and Alfabet.

projects.name: SpaceProto
projects.description: Unity space game prototype project with starter assets and settings.
projects.future: Define core gameplay loop, add basic controls, and build an initial level.

projects.name: unity-collection-archive
projects.description: Archived collection repo for prior Unity projects.

projects.name: ai-pb-data-download-cron
projects.description: Cron-style downloader intended to gather, parse, and store data for the AI pick/ban service.
projects.future: Implement download/parsing pipeline, schedule runs, and add storage targets for processed datasets.

projects.name: discord-jungle-score-bot
projects.description: Discord bot for tracking League of Legends jungle clear times with slash commands and embedded leaderboard logic.
projects.future: Add deployment docs, improve admin workflows, and expand stats/leaderboard views.

projects.name: simple-draft-ui
projects.description: Draft UI concept for managing player champion pools and team comp types.
projects.future: Define data model and build a basic interactive prototype.
